item.title: Lutnick warns no ‘fast deals’ for Japan and South Korea
item.description: U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick also said that Trump’s 10% baseline tariffs remained a “bottom line."

item.title: Coinbase says $2.9 billion Deribit deal will increase profits even as income drops in Q1
item.description: CEO Brian Armstrong added that Deribit’s acquisition is his company’s “biggest move yet” to expand internationally.

item.title: Can sunscreen give you cancer? What experts want you to know
item.description: Experts address concerns about sunblock ingredients.

item.title: Sam Altman urges lawmakers against regulations that could ‘slow down’ U.S. in AI race against China
item.description: In the OpenAI CEO's first congressional hearing in two years, Altman faced few hostile questions or pushback, as lawmakers' attention focuses on compe...

item.title: ‘You better go out and buy stock now,’ Trump said. Markets listened
item.description: "A trade agreement – even if it’s an agreement in principle – is what the markets were looking to see," one analyst said.
